    Allocator.Memory - Interface in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    Memory describes some reserved Memory-Region in Vulkan.
    Generally, Memory allocated by an Allocator has to be also freed by the same Allocator.
    Allocator.MemoryAllocationInfo - Interface in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    Provides information about the memory requirements, etc..

    VertexAttribDescriptor - Record Class in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    A VertexDescriptor describes the data of the vertex inside one buffer, as in "this part of the buffer is that vertexes data, etc..".
    A VertexAttribDescriptor then describes how this data is split and how its accessed in shaders.
    An example can be viewed at VertexDescriptor.
    VertexAttribDescriptor(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for record class Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.VertexAttribDescriptor
    Creates an instance of a VertexAttribDescriptor record class.
    VertexDescriptor - Record Class in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    A VertexDescriptor describes the data of the vertex inside one buffer, as in "this part of the buffer is that vertexes data, etc..".
    A VertexAttribDescriptor then describes how this data is split and how its accessed in shaders.
    Example:

    A buffer is filled with elements, each 3xfloats (position) + 2xfloats (UV-coordinates)
    1.3|2.0|5.3|0|0|4.2|2.0|4.3|1|0|1.6|0.0|2.3|1|1|3.3|1.5|3.8|0|1| a
    A float is 4 bytes, so one element is 4*5 (20) bytes in size!
    VertexDescriptor(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for record class Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.VertexDescriptor
    Creates an instance of a VertexDescriptor record class.
    vertexDescriptors - Variable in class Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.GraphicsPipeline.GraphicsPipelineInfo

    VulkanInstance - Class in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    There is no global state in Vulkan and all per-application state is stored in a VkInstance object.
    VulkanInstance.Device - Record Class in Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan
    A representation of a device, eg. your graphics card or some integrated graphics of your CPU
